name: CloudFormationExecuteChangeSet
description: Executes an AWS CloudFormation change set to create or update a stack.
author: Amazon Web Services

inputs.name: awsCredentials
inputs.label: AWS Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the AWS credentials to use. If needed, click on 'manage', and add a new Service Endpoint of type 'AWSCredentials'

inputs.name: changeSetName
inputs.label: Change Set Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the change set that you want execute.

inputs.name: stackName
inputs.label: Stack Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you specified the name of a change set to execute, specify the stack name or ID (ARN) that is associated with it.

inputs.name: outputVariable
inputs.label: Output Variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable that will contain the ID of the stack on task completion. The variable can be used as $(variableName) to refer to the stack ID in subsequent tasks.

messages.ExecutingChangeSet: Executing change set %s, associated with stack %s
messages.ExecuteChangeSetFailed: Request to execute change set failed with message: %s
messages.WaitingForStack: Waiting for stack %s to reach create completed status
messages.WaitConditionSatisifed: New stack transitioned successfully to completed status
messages.SettingOutputVariable: Setting stack ID into output variable %s
